scripts.build: tsc && cp src/frontend/index.html dist/frontend/index.html && cp src/frontend/vis.min.js dist/frontend/vis.min.js
scripts.ethersolve-cfg-hello: npm run build && node dist/BuildEtherSolveCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/hello_world.sol/HelloWorld.json && python3 PlotCFG.py ../example_cfgs/HelloWorld
scripts.ethersolve-cfg-multiple-functions: npm run build && node dist/BuildEtherSolveCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/multiple_functions.sol/MultipleFunctions.json && python3 PlotCFG.py ../example_cfgs/MultipleFunctions
scripts.ethersolve-cfg-multiple-events: npm run build && node dist/BuildEtherSolveCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/multiple_simple_events.sol/MultipleSimpleEvents.json && python3 PlotCFG.py ../example_cfgs/MultipleSimpleEvents
scripts.ethersolve-cfg-event: npm run build && node dist/BuildEtherSolveCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/simple_event.sol/SimpleEvent.json && python3 PlotCFG.py ../example_cfgs/SimpleEvent
scripts.ethersolve-cfg-counter: npm run build && node dist/BuildEtherSolveCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/counter.sol/Counter.json && python3 PlotCFG.py ../example_cfgs/counter
scripts.ssa-hello: npm run build && node dist/BuildSsaCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/hello_world.sol/HelloWorld.json && python3 PlotSSA.py ../example_ssa/HelloWorld
scripts.create-example-graphs: npm run ethersolve-cfg-hello && npm run ethersolve-cfg-multiple-functions && npm run ethersolve-cfg-multiple-events && npm run ethersolve-cfg-event
scripts.cfg-hello: npm run build && node dist/BuildCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/hello_world.sol/HelloWorld.json && python3 PlotCFG.py
scripts.cfg-event: npm run build && node dist/BuildCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/simple_event.sol/SimpleEvent.json && python3 PlotCFG.py
scripts.cfg-multiple-functions: npm run build && node dist/BuildCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/multiple_functions.sol/MultipleFunctions.json && python3 PlotCFG.py
scripts.cfg-multiple-events: npm run build && node dist/BuildCFG.js -c ../../example_contracts/multiple_simple_events.sol/MultipleSimpleEvents.json && python3 PlotCFG.py
